meanings.definition: The act or work of one who sews.
meanings.sent1: Her sewings were neat and precise.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy doing sewings in my free time.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to help with the sewings but ended up tangled in thread.
meanings.sent4: Her sewings were like a tapestry of memories woven together.
meanings.sent5: The sewings on the dress sparkled under the lights.

meanings.definition: Material or articles that are sewn or to be sewn together.
meanings.sent1: The sewings for the quilt were carefully chosen.
meanings.sent2: She collected various sewings for her craft projects.
meanings.sent3: The box was filled with colorful sewings waiting to be used.
meanings.sent4: The sewings of the fabric created a beautiful pattern.
meanings.sent5: The sewings of the patches added character to the jacket.
